Package test.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.mock

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MockConnection
    Class to be implemented during testing to try and make the test classes easier to read Provides an internal buffer of packets sent via Connection.sendPacket(byte[])
    MockDataServer
    A mock DataServerConnector used in testing Has the ability to change whether MockDataServer.retrieveUserData(String) throws an exception due to an invalid token and MockDataServer.retreiveMeetingData(String) throws an exception due to an invalid meeting id Also whether either will throw an exception due to the data server being 'unavailable' By default the server is available and all tokens and meetingid are valid A defualt test user is returned unless an alternative is provided in the constructor
    ScriptedMockConnection
    A specific implementation of a MockConnection which has a different number of responses which will be returned using receive, or not at all in the case that willReadBlock returns true When a response is read i.e Connection.receiveNextPacket() is called, the response number is incremented by 1
